00062 static int ofd_seqs_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00063 {
00064         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00065         struct ofd_device *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00066 
00067         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", ofd->ofd_seq_count);
00068         return 0;
00069 }
00070 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(ofd_seqs);

00081 static int ofd_tot_dirty_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00082 {
00083         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00084         struct ofd_device *ofd;
00085 
00086         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
00087         ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00088         seq_printf(m, LPU64"\n", ofd->ofd_tot_dirty);
00089         return 0;
00090 }
00091 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(ofd_tot_dirty);

00186 static ssize_t
00187 ofd_precreate_batch_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00188                               size_t count, loff_t *off)
00189 {
00190         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00191         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00192         struct ofd_device *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00193         __s64 val;
00194         int rc;
00195 
00196         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00197         if (rc)
00198                 return rc;
00199 
00200         if (val < 1 || val > INT_MAX)
00201                 return -EINVAL;
00202 
00203         spin_lock(&ofd->ofd_batch_lock);
00204         ofd->ofd_precreate_batch = val;
00205         spin_unlock(&ofd->ofd_batch_lock);
00206         return count;
00207 }
00208 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ofd_precreate_batch);
00209 
00219 static int ofd_last_id_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00220 {
00221         struct obd_device       *obd = m->private;
00222         struct ofd_device       *ofd;
00223         struct ofd_seq          *oseq = NULL;
00224 
00225         if (obd == NULL)
00226                 return 0;
00227 
00228         ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00229 
00230         read_lock(&ofd->ofd_seq_list_lock);
00231         list_for_each_entry(oseq, &ofd->ofd_seq_list, os_list) {
00232                 __u64 seq;
00233 
00234                 seq = ostid_seq(&oseq->os_oi) == 0 ?
00235                       fid_idif_seq(ostid_id(&oseq->os_oi),
00236                                    ofd->ofd_lut.lut_lsd.lsd_osd_index) :
00237                       ostid_seq(&oseq->os_oi);
00238                 seq_printf(m, DOSTID"\n", seq, ostid_id(&oseq->os_oi));
00239         }
00240         read_unlock(&ofd->ofd_seq_list_lock);
00241         return 0;
00242 }
00243 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(ofd_last_id);
00244

00276 static ssize_t
00277 ofd_fmd_max_num_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00278                           size_t count, loff_t *off)
00279 {
00280         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00281         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00282         struct ofd_device *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00283         __s64 val;
00284         int rc;
00285 
00286         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00287         if (rc)
00288                 return rc;
00289 
00290         if (val > 65536 || val < 1)
00291                 return -EINVAL;
00292 
00293         ofd->ofd_fmd_max_num = val;
00294         return count;
00295 }
00296 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ofd_fmd_max_num);

00310 static int ofd_fmd_max_age_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00311 {
00312         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00313         struct ofd_device *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00314 
00315         seq_printf(m, "%ld\n", jiffies_to_msecs(ofd->ofd_fmd_max_age) /
00316                    MSEC_PER_SEC);
00317         return 0;
00318 }

00334 static ssize_t
00335 ofd_fmd_max_age_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00336                           size_t count, loff_t *off)
00337 {
00338         struct seq_file         *m = file->private_data;
00339         struct obd_device       *obd = m->private;
00340         struct ofd_device       *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00341         __s64                    val;
00342         int                      rc;
00343 
00344         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00345         if (rc)
00346                 return rc;
00347 
00348         if (val > 65536 || val < 1)
00349                 return -EINVAL;
00350 
00351         ofd->ofd_fmd_max_age = msecs_to_jiffies(val * MSEC_PER_SEC);
00352         return count;
00353 }
00354 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ofd_fmd_max_age);

00397 static ssize_t
00398 ofd_degraded_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00399                        size_t count, loff_t *off)
00400 {
00401         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00402         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00403         struct ofd_device *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00404         int rc;
00405         __s64 val;
00406 
00407         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00408         if (rc)
00409                 return rc;
00410 
00411         spin_lock(&ofd->ofd_flags_lock);
00412         ofd->ofd_raid_degraded = !!val;
00413         spin_unlock(&ofd->ofd_flags_lock);
00414         return count;
00415 }
00416 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ofd_degraded);

00427 static int ofd_fstype_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00428 {
00429         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00430         struct ofd_device *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00431         struct lu_device  *d;
00432 
00433         LASSERT(ofd->ofd_osd);
00434         d = &ofd->ofd_osd->dd_lu_dev;
00435         LASSERT(d->ld_type);
00436         seq_printf(m, "%s\n", d->ld_type->ldt_name);
00437         return 0;
00438 }
00439 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(ofd_fstype);

00480 static ssize_t
00481 ofd_syncjournal_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00482                           size_t count, loff_t *off)
00483 {
00484         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00485         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00486         struct ofd_device *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00487         __s64 val;
00488         int rc;
00489 
00490         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00491         if (rc)
00492                 return rc;
00493 
00494         if (val < 0)
00495                 return -EINVAL;
00496 
00497         spin_lock(&ofd->ofd_flags_lock);
00498         ofd->ofd_syncjournal = !!val;
00499         ofd_slc_set(ofd);
00500         spin_unlock(&ofd->ofd_flags_lock);
00501 
00502         return count;
00503 }
00504 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ofd_syncjournal);
00505 
00506 /* This must be longer than the longest string below */
00507 #define SYNC_STATES_MAXLEN 16
00508 
00509 static int ofd_brw_size_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00510 {
00511         struct obd_device       *obd = m->private;
00512         struct ofd_device       *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00513         int                      rc;
00514 
00515         rc = seq_printf(m, "%u\n", ofd->ofd_brw_size / ONE_MB_BRW_SIZE);
00516         return rc;
00517 }
00518 
00519 static ssize_t
00520 ofd_brw_size_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00521                        size_t count, loff_t *off)
00522 {
00523         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00524         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00525         struct ofd_device *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00526         __s64 val;
00527         int rc;
00528 
00529         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00530         if (rc)
00531                 return rc;
00532 
00533         if (val < 0)
00534                 return -EINVAL;
00535 
00536         val = val * ONE_MB_BRW_SIZE;
00537         if (val <= 0 || val > DT_MAX_BRW_SIZE)
00538                 return -ERANGE;
00539 
00540         spin_lock(&ofd->ofd_flags_lock);
00541         ofd->ofd_brw_size = val;
00542         spin_unlock(&ofd->ofd_flags_lock);
00543 
00544         return count;
00545 }
00546 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ofd_brw_size);
00547 
00548 static char *sync_on_cancel_states[] = {"never",
00549                                         "blocking",
00550                                         "always" };
00551 
00561 static int ofd_sync_lock_cancel_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00562 {
00563         struct obd_device       *obd = m->private;
00564         struct lu_target        *tgt = obd->u.obt.obt_lut;
00565 
00566         seq_printf(m, "%s\n",
00567                    sync_on_cancel_states[tgt->lut_sync_lock_cancel]);
00568         return 0;
00569 }
00570 
00592 static ssize_t
00593 ofd_sync_lock_cancel_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00594                                size_t count, loff_t *off)
00595 {
00596         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00597         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00598         struct lu_target *tgt = obd->u.obt.obt_lut;
00599         char kernbuf[SYNC_STATES_MAXLEN];
00600         __s64 val = -1;
00601         int i;
00602 
00603         if (count == 0 || count >= sizeof(kernbuf))
00604                 return -EINVAL;
00605 
00606         if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buffer, count))
00607                 return -EFAULT;
00608         kernbuf[count] = 0;
00609 
00610         if (kernbuf[count - 1] == '\n')
00611                 kernbuf[count - 1] = 0;
00612 
00613         for (i = 0 ; i < NUM_SYNC_ON_CANCEL_STATES; i++) {
00614                 if (strcmp(kernbuf, sync_on_cancel_states[i]) == 0) {
00615                         val = i;
00616                         break;
00617                 }
00618         }
00619 
00620         /* Legacy numeric codes */
00621         if (val == -1) {
00622                 int rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00623                 if (rc)
00624                         return rc;
00625         }
00626 
00627         if (val < 0 || val > 2)
00628                 return -EINVAL;
00629 
00630         spin_lock(&tgt->lut_flags_lock);
00631         tgt->lut_sync_lock_cancel = val;
00632         spin_unlock(&tgt->lut_flags_lock);
00633         return count;
00634 }
00635 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ofd_sync_lock_cancel);
00636

00677 static ssize_t
00678 ofd_grant_compat_disable_seq_write(struct file *file,
00679                                    const char __user *buffer,
00680                                    size_t count, loff_t *off)
00681 {
00682         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00683         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00684         struct ofd_device *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00685         __s64 val;
00686         int rc;
00687 
00688         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00689         if (rc)
00690                 return rc;
00691 
00692         if (val < 0)
00693                 return -EINVAL;
00694 
00695         spin_lock(&ofd->ofd_flags_lock);
00696         ofd->ofd_grant_compat_disable = !!val;
00697         spin_unlock(&ofd->ofd_flags_lock);
00698 
00699         return count;
00700 }
00701 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ofd_grant_compat_disable);

00740 ofd_soft_sync_limit_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,

00784 static ssize_t
00785 ofd_lfsck_speed_limit_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00786                                 size_t count, loff_t *off)
00787 {
00788         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00789         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00790         struct ofd_device *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00791         __s64 val;
00792         int rc;
00793 
00794         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00795         if (rc != 0)
00796                 return rc;
00797 
00798         if (val < 0)
00799                 return -ERANGE;
00800 
00801         rc = lfsck_set_speed(ofd->ofd_osd, val);
00802 
00803         return rc != 0 ? rc : count;
00804 }
00805 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ofd_lfsck_speed_limit);

00834 static int ofd_lfsck_verify_pfid_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00835 {
00836         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00837         struct ofd_device *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00838 
00839         seq_printf(m, "switch: %s\ndetected: "LPU64"\nrepaired: "LPU64"\n",
00840                    ofd->ofd_lfsck_verify_pfid ? "on" : "off",
00841                    ofd->ofd_inconsistency_self_detected,
00842                    ofd->ofd_inconsistency_self_repaired);
00843         return 0;
00844 }

00862 static ssize_t
00863 ofd_lfsck_verify_pfid_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00864                                 size_t count, loff_t *off)
00865 {
00866         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00867         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00868         struct ofd_device *ofd = ofd_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00869         __s64 val;
00870         int rc;
00871 
00872         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00873         if (rc != 0)
00874                 return rc;
00875 
00876         ofd->ofd_lfsck_verify_pfid = !!val;
00877 
00878         return count;
00879 }

00907 struct lprocfs_vars lprocfs_ofd_obd_vars[] = {
00908         { .name =       "uuid",
00909           .fops =       &ofd_uuid_fops                  },
00910         { .name =       "blocksize",
00911           .fops =       &ofd_blksize_fops               },
00912         { .name =       "kbytestotal",
00913           .fops =       &ofd_kbytestotal_fops           },
00914         { .name =       "kbytesfree",
00915           .fops =       &ofd_kbytesfree_fops            },

00980 
00986 void ofd_stats_counter_init(struct lprocfs_stats *stats)
00987 {
00988         LASSERT(stats && stats->ls_num >= LPROC_OFD_STATS_LAST);
00989 
00990         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_OFD_STATS_READ,
00991                              LPROCFS_CNTR_AVGMINMAX, "read_bytes", "bytes");
00992         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_OFD_STATS_WRITE,
00993                              LPROCFS_CNTR_AVGMINMAX, "write_bytes", "bytes");
00994         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_OFD_STATS_GETATTR,
00995                              0, "getattr", "reqs");
00996         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_OFD_STATS_SETATTR,
00997                              0, "setattr", "reqs");
00998         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_OFD_STATS_PUNCH,
00999                              0, "punch", "reqs");
01000         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_OFD_STATS_SYNC,
01001                              0, "sync", "reqs");
01002         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_OFD_STATS_DESTROY,
01003                              0, "destroy", "reqs");
01004         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_OFD_STATS_CREATE,
01005                              0, "create", "reqs");
01006         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_OFD_STATS_STATFS,
01007                              0, "statfs", "reqs");
01008         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_OFD_STATS_GET_INFO,
01009                              0, "get_info", "reqs");
01010         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_OFD_STATS_SET_INFO,
01011                              0, "set_info", "reqs");
01012         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_OFD_STATS_QUOTACTL,
01013                              0, "quotactl", "reqs");
01014 }
